code: import React from"react";import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import'./SideBarButton.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SideBarButton(props){const{name,clickAction,onClickAction,setClickAction}=props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"SideBarButton",variant:"outline-primary",onClick:()=>setClickAction(onClickAction),active:clickAction===onClickAction,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:'SideBarButton-Name',children:name})});};export default SideBarButton;
